title: Apply a Promotional Code to a Booking
description: A guest is booking online and wants to apply a promotional discount code.

tasks.description: The guest enters the promotional code into the booking engine.
The system validates the code and checks its terms and conditions (e.g., valid dates, applicable room types).
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms the code is valid for the guest's selected dates.

tasks.description: The system applies the discount and displays the new, lower rate to the guest.
tasks.expected_outcome: The final price is updated to reflect the promotion.
